text: Darth Plagueis is a Sith in the Star Wars universe. He was the teacher of Palpatine. He was first mentioned in Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith by Palpatine to Anakin Skywalker and became a character in various novels. ==Biography== Darth Plagueis the Wise was a feared Sith Lord who wanted to bring people back to life, including his own. He was killed in his sleep by his apprentice, Darth Sidious. ==Reception== After the release of Revenge of the Sith, the Tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise became one of the most memorable scenes of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2005 Category:Star Wars characters
title: Darth Plagueis
